monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Air Sickle
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Air Sickle Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disoriented
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) causes enemies affected by it to have a 7.5% chance to miss each hit.

skills.name: Dodging
skills.description: Increases chance to dodge enemy hits by 8%.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: On each hit, there's a 10% chance to trigger another hit with the same base damage. (Cannot trigger again on Double Strike hits)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Fiery Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Fiery Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Prehistoric Screech
skills.description: Aura: Aerial and Reptile monster deal 7.5% increased damage and additional 15% against shielded enemies.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Rejuvenate
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Rejuvenate Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Rejuvenate Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Sensitivity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness causes enemies to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Shadow Proc
skills.description: Every action applies an additional damage hit (75% Attack or Magic), shield (75% Defense), heal (7.5% Max Health) or a random Buff, depending on action type.

skills.name: Sonic Assault
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Sonic Assault Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Sonic Wave
skills.description: 2 x 60% (120%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Strike Mastery
skills.description: This monster can receive an additional Stack of Might, Sorcery and Sidekick. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Thick Skin
skills.description: This Monster takes 10% more damage from the element it's weak to. Other damage is reduced by 20%.

skills.name: Tornado
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, cannot be dodged Removes 1 Buff from targets

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.
